data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vasil’Eva, Ekaterina D., Kim, Daemin, Vasil’Ev, Victor P., Ko, Myeong-Hun, Won, Yong-Jin (2016): Cobitis nalbanti, a new species of spined loach from South Korea, and redescription of Cobitis lutheri (Teleostei: Cobitidae). Zootaxa 4208 (6): 577-591, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4208.6.5|6 occurrences
